fields.description: Enter the contract title.
fields.label: Title

fields.description: Select the vendor for this contract.
fields.label: Vendor

fields.description: Select the category for this contract.
fields.label: Category

fields.description: Choose the contract type (contract, subscription, renewal, or maintenance).
fields.label: Contract Kind

fields.description: Choose the billing cycle for this contract.
fields.label: Billing Cycle

fields.description: Date when the contract starts.
fields.label: Start Date

fields.description: Date when the contract ends.
fields.label: End Date

fields.description: Next renewal date for this contract.
fields.label: Next Renewal Date

fields.description: Number of notice days required before renewal.
fields.label: Notice Days

fields.description: If enabled, the contract renews automatically.
fields.label: Auto Renew

fields.description: Enter the current contract amount; use net or gross per the VAT setting.
fields.label: Current Amount

fields.description: Choose the current contract status.
fields.label: Status
fields.options:
Draft
Active
Pending Renewal
Renewed
Cancelled
Expired

fields.description: Select the contract owner.
fields.label: Owner User

fields.description: Link to the baseline expense that created this contract.
fields.label: Source Baseline Expense

fields.description: Add internal notes about the contract.
fields.label: Notes

fields.description: Upload the contract file.
fields.label: Attachment

fields.description: If enabled, the current amount includes VAT.
fields.label: Current Amount Includes VAT

fields.description: VAT rate applied to the current amount.
fields.label: VAT Rate

fields.description: Calculated automatically from current amount and VAT settings.
fields.label: Net Amount

fields.description: Calculated automatically as the VAT portion.
fields.label: VAT Amount

fields.description: Calculated automatically as the gross amount.
fields.label: Gross Amount
